body_html:
For CPU, I do not see a reason why we cannot.
For GPU, we are strictly required to build on top of nvidia cuda docker images.
So If nvidia/cuda has ubuntu 18.04, it is certainly possible for us, too.
body_text:
For CPU, I do not see a reason why we cannot.
For GPU, we are strictly required to build on top of nvidia cuda docker images.
So If nvidia/cuda has ubuntu 18.04, it is certainly possible for us, too.
body:
For CPU, I do not see a reason why we cannot.
For GPU, we are strictly required to build on top of nvidia cuda docker images.
So If nvidia/cuda has ubuntu 18.04, it is certainly possible for us, too.
